summary: A crazy out of work actress, Vashti Blue, spends all her time in her small apartment with her pet owl and her telephone, which she uses to try and solve all her problems with life.
cast: Whoopi Goldberg|Severn Darden|Elliott Gould|John Heard|Ronald J. Stallings|John Hattan|Lina Chu|James Victor|Robin Menken|Danae Torn|Hervé Villechaize|Don Blakely|Amy Wright
title: El teléfono
